document.masterDocTitle: The genus Colletes (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae) in Central Asia

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: The genus Colletes (Hymenoptera: Apoidea: Colletidae) in Central Asia

subSubSection.paragraph:
Colletes anceps Radoszkowski 1891 : 256
, ♀, ♂ ( type locality: north coast of Caspian See).
Colletes caspicus anceps : Warncke 1978 : 334
–335.

Published records. Noskiewicz ( 1936 : 180 ): Kazakhstan , Tajikistan , Turkmenistan , Uzbekistan ; Popov ( 1935 : 357 ): Tajikistan ; Ponomareva ( 1960 : 135 ): Turkmenistan ; Popov ( 1967 : 14 ): Uzbekistan ; Atdayev ( 1972 : 118 ): Turkmenistan ; Warncke ( 1978 : 335 ): “sowjetisch Mittelasien”; Kuhlmann ( 2005 : 1364 ); Kuhlmann ( 2009 a: 16 ): Kazakhstan , Uzbekistan , Kyrgyzstan , Turkmenistan , Tajikistan .
General distribution. Russia , Turkey , Kazakhstan , Uzbekistan , Kyrgyzstan , Turkmenistan , Tajikistan , Iran , Afghanistan , Pakistan , China (Xinjiang).
